      • compare

        public static int compare(double score1,
                          double score2,
                          boolean minimize)
        Compare two scores. Returns a negative integer, zero or a positive integer as the first score is better, equal to or worst than the second score.
        Parameters:
        score1 - The first score.
        score2 - The second score.
        minimize - A boolean that indicates if scores should be minimized.
        Returns:
        A comparison integer.

      • getWinner

        public static Genome getWinner(java.util.List<Genome> genomes,
                               boolean minimize)
        Return the winner (best) of the list.
        Parameters:
        genomes - The list of genomes.
        minimize - A boolean that indicates if scores should be minimized.
        Returns:
        The winner or best genome.

      • getLooser

        public static Genome getLooser(java.util.List<Genome> genomes,

        Return the looser (worst) of the list.
        Parameters:
        genomes - The list of genomes.
        minimize - A boolean that indicates if scores should be minimized.
        Returns:
        The loser or worst genome.
